text: Over the Hills and Far Away is the first EP by the Finnish symphonic metal group Nightwish. == Track listing == # Over the Hills and Far Away (Gary Moore-cover) - 5.03 # 10th Man Down (feat. Tapio Wilska) - 5.24 # Away - 4.33 # Astral Romance (feat. Tony Kakko) - 5.22 == Personnel == * Tarja Turunen – vocals * Tuomas Holopainen – keyboards * Emppu Vuorinen – guitars * Sami Vänskä – bass guitar * Jukka Nevalainen – drums Category:2001 albums
title: Over the Hills and Far Away
